name: fluidcalendar
tagline: A collaborative self-hosted calendar for shared scheduling and planning
description: Fluid Calendar is a collaborative self-hosted calendar app with schedule sharing, drag-and-drop events, and multiple calendar views. Suitable for small teams or family planning with full ownership of event data.

features.title: Calendar Management
features.description: Create and manage events in a web-based calendar

features.title: Event Scheduling
features.description: Schedule events with start and end times

features.title: Recurring Events
features.description: Define repeating events on a schedule

features.title: Calendar Views
features.description: Switch between daily, weekly, and monthly views

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Access and manage calendars through a browser

features.title: Data Persistence
features.description: Store calendar events for later access
